summary: Four new Followers for your enjoyment!
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/b8w7l3.png[/IMG][/center]
[b]Current Build:[/b] 1.0
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/b8w7l3.png[/IMG][/center]
[b]Description:[/b] Four new followers to use and abuse at your leisure, all four of them are fully killable, thus interacting with lore in the staunchest form possible. The four are;
[b]Uramulg[/b] An Orc Battlemage skulking in the hall of elements, a full member of the College of Winterhold and an exceptional student of Destruction Magic.
[b]Haaki[/b] A ferocious ginger Nord Warrior, who decimates all foes with his deadly sword and shield combination, however he is partial to drinks at the Winking Skeever, where you will find him.
[b]Halford[/b] A Bosmer Spellsword, deadly with his weapons of choice and healing spells, but seems to only like the area of Falkreath, must be the Dead Mans Drink that he enjoys.
[b]Bun-Za[/b] A shady Argonian who sits within the Bannered Mare.
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/b8w7l3.png[/IMG][/center]
[b]Current Features:[/b]
[i]New NPCs with Unique Names
New Followers[/i]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/b8w7l3.png[/IMG][/center]
[b]Install:[/b]
[b]1.[/b] Download Followers.zip
[b]2.[/b] Extract/unzip with Winrar or Winzip
[b]3.[/b] Place extracted files into your skyrim/data directory
[b]4.[/b] Activate FollowerPack.esp
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/b8w7l3.png[/IMG][/center]
[b]Uninstall:[/b]
[b]1.[/b] Delete FollowerPack.esp
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/b8w7l3.png[/IMG][/center]
author: Caski
